home.welcome1: Welcome to BookDiary, your essential tool for tracking your reading journey. Our app allows you to log books you've read, monitor your reading progress, and maintain a thoughtful diary of your literary adventures.
home.welcome2: Whether you're a casual reader or a dedicated bookworm, BookDiary helps you visualize your achievements and stay motivated to reach your reading goals.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy - BookDiary
privacy.heading: Privacy Policy for BookDiary
privacy.section1Text: BookDiary does not collect personal information except for login credentials (such as email) and the user's chosen name (Name/Nickname) required for authentication using Supabase. This information is stored securely and used solely for user identification and account management.
privacy.section2Text: No sensitive or financial data is collected. Data is used only for providing the core functionality of the app, such as tracking reading progress and managing your book diary. Your data is not shared, sold, or rented to third parties for any reason.
privacy.section3Text: We do not use your data for advertising, and we do not engage in deep user tracking or analytics beyond basic app performance monitoring.
privacy.section4Text: Users have the right to delete their personal data. You can permanently delete your account and all associated data (including your reading history and notes) at any time directly within the application settings. Once initiated, account deletion is immediate and irreversible.
privacy.section5Text: If you have questions about this policy, please contact us at:
